mechanical_performance.engine: Hybrid engine: 2.5L 4-Cylinder with 240 net combined hp
features: Hybrid engine: 2.5L 4-Cylinder with 240 net combined hp
Eco, Normal and Sport drive modes

exterior_features: LED projector low- and high-beam headlights
LED Daytime Running Lights (DRL) accent lighting
Height-adjustable hands-free power liftgate with jam protection
interior_features: Leather-trimmed seats
8-way power-adjustable driver’s seat with lumbar support and memory function
8-way power-adjustable front passenger seat
Heated and ventilated front seats
Heated rear outboard seats
Dual zone automatic climate control system with dust and pollen filter and rear-seat vents
Heated leather-trimmed tilt/telescopic steering wheel
60/40 split fold-flat rear seats with extension board
12.3-in. digital gauge cluster with selectable gauges
Smart Key System on all doors and liftgate with Push Button Start
Qi-compatible vertical wireless smartphone charging
connected_services_trials: Service Connect with up to 10-year trial (4G network dependent)
Remote Connect with 1-year trial (4G network dependent)
Safety Connect with up to 10-year trial (4G network dependent)
Drive Connect with 1-year trial (4G network dependent)
safety_convenience_features: Blind Spot Monitor (BSM) with Rear Cross-Traffic Alert (RCTA)
